hero-title: Zad Academy for teaching the Holy Quran
hero-p-1: Individual Study for the Holy Quran through separate halaqat for men and women.
hero-p-2: A dedicated section for children's memorization.
hero-p-3: A specialized section for ijazat of the holy quran and ”Al-Qiraat al-Ashr”.
hero-p-5: Teaching the Quran to non-Arabic-speaking students.
why-1-p: Students have the freedom to choose their available times and days, with the ability to modify schedules as needed.
why-2-p: Tailored lessons between the student and the teacher at the student's preferred time.
why-3-title: Special section for non native speakers:
why-3-p: Special section for non-Arabic-speaking students with lessons conducted in various languages.
why-4-title: Special Lessons for Reading and Writing:
why-4-p: Learning to read and write including Nooraniyah and Noor Al-Bayan methods.
why-5-p: Monthly competitions and certificates of appreciation for outstanding students.
why-6-p: Monthly tests to monitor the student's progress.
mission-p: To comprehensively teach the Quran, including rules of recitation, Tajweed, memorization, interpretation, and contemplation, leading to practical implementation, using effective educational methods.
vision-p-1: Facilitate and promote the memorization of the holy quran for all age groups worldwide.
vision-p-2: fostering generations well-versed in the Book of Allah Azzawajal, the Prophet's Sunnah, and its practical application.
vision-p-3: As a non-profit academy, all services are provided at symbolic fees to accommodate everyone.
objectives-p-1: Strive to become a model Quranic institution and a pioneer in Quranic education-related fields.
objectives-p-2: Teaching the holy quran comprehensively through effective plans and programs, leading to practical application and adherence.
objectives-p-3: Instill the love of the Quran in people's hearts.
objectives-p-4: Graduate individuals embodying Quranic morals and ethics annually.
objectives-p-5: Aspire to fulfill the promised goodness mentioned by the Prophet - Salaa Allah Alayh Wasalam - in the saying, "The best among you are those who learn the Quran and teach it." [Al-Bukhari]
specifically: Or contact us to design a plan specifically for you
freeTrial: Contact us now to get a free trial session for a limited time
